Package yizhong.ding.mavendependencydownloader

Class DependencyParser

java.lang.Object
yizhong.ding.mavendependencydownloader.DependencyParser
public class DependencyParser
extends java.lang.Object
Plays the role of parsing a list of (direct) dependency of a given Artifact. It uses HTTP based fetcher to retrieve a POM file and return the Dependencies lists on the POM file.
Author:
Yizhong Ding

    • fetchDependencies

      public static java.util.List<Artifact> fetchDependencies​(Artifact artifact)
      This Method fetches the dependency list by parsing the POM file.
      Parameters:
      artifact - The target artifact to get dependencies.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of artifact dependencies.

    • getUpdatedDependencies

      public static java.util.Set<Artifact> getUpdatedDependencies​(Artifact centralArtifact, java.util.Set<Artifact> downloaded)
      This method updates the versions of a given dependency set by parsing the central POM file.
      Parameters:
      centralArtifact - the artifact containing all version info.
      downloaded - the given downloaded set.
      Returns:
      a updated set containing new versions.

    • fetchVersion

      public static java.lang.String fetchVersion​(org.jdom2.Element responses)
      Fetch available version by finding the first version in "str name='v'" element
      Parameters:
      responses - response of the Http request that is in the format of a Pom file
      Returns:
      returns the available version string. returns null if it does not exists.

    • getCentralArtifact

      public static Artifact getCentralArtifact​(Artifact target)
      Get an Artifact containing all version info. The mechanism implemented here searches for "-" signs in the artifact name. Depending on whether one or two dashes are found, the supposed central-artifact name (containing all version numbers) is constructed and searched for. If no such artifact was found this method returns null and has no further effect.
      Parameters:
      target - as the artifact to search a central version artifact file for.
      Returns:
      the artifact containing all version info, if it esists. Null otherwise.
